reviews.review:
The Game is basically seek-and-hide.
You can play a killer or one of 4 surviver.

It's a bit horror when you hide before something, most when you don't know whos the killer.

Only problem in the game is, that Killer seem to have more positive perks and imposed. Camping is not forbidden andit's hard to go against it. The killer can't die and it's quite hard to blind em with a flashlight. (Sometimes I think it's buggy)

But at all yeah... There are some bugs that appear from time to time... like perks that don't work...

All together it's still a good game.

This game has been REALLY rough lately. The current MMR makes it so that killers get MMR really easily thus forcing you to play against sweaty players. This might be fine for some but I play exclusively for casual play since I think the game is terribly balanced (I used to play more competitively but that quickly grew tiresome). This game also has some of the most aggressive monetisation I have seen in a retail price game. Stay away from Dead By Daylight for a bit, the devs have a laundry list of bugs to fix too so I wouldn't buy this game right now.
This game is one of the best horror-survival multiplayer games  i've played in a long time. The game is full of action an super creepy "villians" whos object is to track you down and kill you.
Noice game you should buy it Guys

Very Good Game! Need skill to improve!
A fun strategic horror game with friends which can become quite addicting unless you hate horror or like relaxing type of games.
Great Dead by Daylight, never failing at disappointing it's community
The game is good but matchmaking with a friend takes very long and most of time an error occurs. If they fix this, This will be a very fun game to play

Tampoco es menor el hecho de tener que comprar personajes por separado para poder tener acceso al juego en su completitud (sin los asesinos y supervivientes de DLC hay algunas misiones con recompensas  y logros que no se pueden obtener).

This game is great for everyone, hard core players and casual players. The devs are pretty good. My advice is just don't take it seriously and have fun with it.

Gioco Molto bello da giocare con degli amici,
ottimo passatempo e buona scelta tra la sezione killer, un p√≤ di bug qua e la ma in definitiva lo consiglierei.
Fun as long as people remember this is just a game and it's not real life
Pay to enjoy, impossible to open new characters.
sweaty game but defo worth the purchase
If you have suicidal tendencies I recomend the game.

Great game! I like all the guest appearances (even tho you have to pay for them), i love the leveling system, the skill tree mechanics are fun, it's easy to pick up but hard to master. I'd recommend looking at it a little bit online before buying, because it's pretty unique and not everyone will like it. Fun gameplay, fun mechanics, but some stuff is behind a paywall. 8/10!

UPDATED: 06/04/2022

I love how this is essentially multi player vs. single player, 4 survivors vs. 1 killer. 

I'm more of a single-player, I'm not against multi but do love multi-player games that remember us single players.

I would recommend everyone to expect to have really bad game sessions in this game. There is so much potential and fun can be had for sure. However, there is a toxic cloud that hangs over this game and a big survivor vs. killer mentality between players which sadly has a big negative impact on the enjoyment of the game. 

The game is severely survivor friendly as if a team works really well together, there is no chance for the killer unless your top level great at this game. This is super frustrating and leads to players getting tunnelled, camped or slugged by killers who know its there only chance to win. Some game sessions are just a complete mess and feels like you wasted time, other game sessions are great fun and fun can be had in game.

The fault of this is on developers and the playing community, more so the playing community as they just can't accept not doing something they know isn't fun for other players. Developers don't help as they haven't actually came out and said they consider it wrong, they have instead told people not to report it on there T&C which players use as an excuse for the cheap tactics they do in matches, both survivor and killer side is as bad as each other.  

Developers could do something about the toxic tactics in game by taken the ability to do them out of game, or even penalizing the player with negative blood points, but so far, they have done nothing and its not a new issue, its been around longer than I played the game. Developers are the only ones that can resolve this and so far they haven't, hopefully, at some point they do as if so, this game would be consistently great to play,

I still have fun besides these issues but I needed to spend a lot of time to find the fun and took  a month of game to help with that.

Developers are adding new chapters frequently and new content gets added as well, so there always a new killer, new perks or an old character/perk gets updates, so there plenty of choices on who to play and a large shelf life to game.
